title: Inaugural ST Taiwan Tech Day Highlights Mobility, Power, Connectivity, and Sensing Trends - Eetasia.com
summary: STMicroelectronics is holding its first-ever ST Taiwan Tech Day, focusing on Smart Mobility, Power & Energy, IoT & Connectivity, and Sensing the World. The event showcases innovations like zonal gateway for automotive systems, 3rd-generation SiC modules for EV inverters, digital power solutions for efficient power supplies, and edge AI washing machines for energy and water efficiency.
likely_naics_codes: ['334413 - Semiconductor and Related Device Manufacturing', '335124 - Motor Vehicle Electrical Equipment Manufacturing', '334516 - Electronic Computer Manufacturing', '335222 - Household Appliance Manufacturing']
greenwashing: There is no indication of greenwashing in the article, as the innovations presented are genuinely focused on sustainability and environmental benefits.

title: How to be Eco-Friendly - The Independent
summary: The article presents a comprehensive guide to making your home more environmentally friendly by incorporating green innovations and sustainable practices. It outlines various eco-friendly home improvements, such as energy-efficient lighting, smart thermostats, low-carbon heating systems, insulation, and weatherproofing, while emphasizing the importance of using renewable energy sources and energy-efficient appliances. Additionally, it addresses the need for water conservation and waste reduction, including recycling and composting, encouraging readers to make greener choices in their daily lives.
greenwashing: The article does not mention any specific examples of greenwashing practices.
